attributes.action: encourage the growth of a british computer chip/component industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Usually computer chips and components are from companies which are US based. This monopoly is bad for UK industry as it is forced to rely upon a small number of companies for products which are now necessary for business. The government could give tax breaks to UK computer companies to try to encourage the growth of alternative suppliers based in the UK.
